channel.title: Please help! "When a player logs in..."
channel.description:
[b]When a player logs into the server how do I make it tell him/her how many people are logged in? I know part of the code is [/b]
sM("Message");
[b] but... I don't know how to make it tell him/her how many players are logged in. I want it to say something like [/b]
Welcome to PwnScape there are 21 players online!
[b]Thanks! ;D -Jim[/b]

item.title: Please help! "When a player logs in..."
item.dc:creator: @agfy25 agfy25
item.description:
@agfy25 wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:2, topic:365149”]In your login method. Add something like

sendMessage("There are currently " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players playing PwnScape");[/quote]
Thanks sooo much!
Hey do you think you can help me with any of these?

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,461345.msg3375040.html,
or this one,
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,461283.msg3374555.html

Read full topic
item.source: Please help! "When a player logs in..."

item.title: Please help! "When a player logs in..."

item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

In your login method. Add something like

sendMessage("There are currently " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players playing PwnScape");

When a player logs into the server how do I make it tell him/her how many people are logged in? I know part of the code is

but… I don’t know how to make it tell him/her how many players are logged in. I want it to say something like
Welcome to PwnScape there are 21 players online!

Thanks! ;D
